author: Fadel Allassan
title: California Gov. Gavin Newsom unveils roadmap for relaxing coronavirus lockdowns
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom released a roadmap on Tuesday that will guide how he will make the decision to relax the stay-at-home policies his state implemented to combat the spread of the coronavirus. The big picture: While there is no timeline for modifyin…
content:
California Gov. Gavin Newsom released a roadmap on Tuesday that will guide how he will make the decision to relax the stay-at-home policies his state implemented to combat the spread of the coronavirus.
